entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sharbot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:17 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle. Freezing rain or periods of rain beginning late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or ice pellets changing to ice pellets or snow mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then diminishing to 20 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
